attributes.action:
lady's with  Endometriosis and polycystic ovary's
to get hidden disability help
attributes.additional_details: Endometriosis occurs when  tissue grows on your ovaries, bowel, and tissues lining your pelvis. I personally have Endometriosis and Polycystic Ovary's since age of 12, the pain I have is unbearable, I have to take time of work due to pain to be told this condition is not a work disability and there is no help for me, I have to take pain killers  Zoldex which is a cancer treatment and causes me to hurt as my Endo is stuck to my bowel and bladder and is growing up my back and has caused Arthritis.
attributes.background:
Endometriosis and polycystic ovaries is a disorder in women and is very painful in which lady's have taken there own life over the pain. 
This condition is so serious it should be a hidden disability.
I have to take time of work due to this condition and feel like I do not get any help.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you want to see more help for women with Endometriosis, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like to happen. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328570
